tool_description: Generate custom QR Code with Logo, Solid and Gradient Colors. Upload images permanently on our storage and use them forever on your generated QR Code.
name: QR Code Generator with Logo and Color - FancyQR
title: QR Code Generator with Logo and Color - FancyQR
tool_name: QR Code Generator with Logo and Color - FancyQR

api_list.name: Standard QR Code
api_list.description: Generate custom QR Code with Logo image, Solid colors and Gradient.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-generator-with-logo-and-color-fancyqr.p.rapidapi.com/?action=standard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-generator-with-logo-and-color-fancyqr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Upload Image
api_list.description: Upload your image permanently on our storage and use it to embed on the QR Code.

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description:
The file which will be uploaded to the storage.
Accepted Types: **PNG**/**JPG**/**JPEG**
Max-Size: **1mb**
